title: Piesel Alt
author: Piesel Alt
content: This is to bring to everyone notice that I have decided to become active with this account piesel Alt until my main account is recovered, because I have missed the forum since my main account piesel was hacked sometime in January 2023, and I have submitted the relevant proofs by signing a message with my bitcoin address, that I am the original owner of the account piesel to the email provided by forum administrators for account recovery. While waiting for the admin response on that, I have decided to continue being active with this alt till I receive a response from the account recovery team, so I will like to bring to everyone notice, that I have resumed full activeness with this account until I recover my main account piesel which was hacked but now locked due to my usage of the secret question. So I urge you all to give me every necessary support needed in thos forum until I recover my account,  this account is officially announced as my alt, everyone please take note. You can follow up with the discussion in the threads listed below: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5436479.msg61648673#msg61648673

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Instead of waiting for the admin (theymos)'s response, I would recommend you to send him a PM daily regarding your case for better odds of getting attention from him.Quote from: Piesel Alt on April 30, 2023, 07:02:29 PMSo I urge you all to give me every necessary support needed in thos forum until I recover my account,What kind of support are you expecting from ppl ?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Based on the thread link you provided, I believe your issue has not been attended to either because the team has been very busy or because you have not convinced them enough that you are the rightful owner of the account since there is already another active account that also has the same claim to account ownership.One user claims to have the older Ethereum address used on the account since 2018, and you claim to have a Bitcoin address, which you have managed to sign in with, but the other user hasn't because a Bitcoin address is the only valid way to use it. I also noticed most members did not agree with your used address and proposed you use an older address, which you haven't, which I think might add to things that make your issue pending to date. I don't know, but it's just my guess.

I don't know, but it's just my guess. The other user you referred to is the hacker who took control of the account with his access to my PC file and email,  and he has become inactive since then, I am well aware of how long it takes for admin to attend to account-related issues that have to do with secrets questions usage because of the previous compromise that happened in the forum some time ago. So I am sure the team are just following the normal procedures and I know for sure in the long run the account is going to be recovered but until then I will remain active with thos account.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Question 1: Are you still in control of the original email that was used to lock the account?Question 2: If yes, did you write to the provided email address of your locked account with proof such as signed message? Sending a PM to Admin or Global Mods won't help. The team handling account recoveries is different.Question 3: How do you want members to support you? Your thread appealing for your account to be unlocked is even locked.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: If you want to adhere to the rules of the forum, then your topic today violates them. Since the banned account must wait for it to be unlocked, its alternate account is only allowed to post in the thread on its account's appeal. You are currently in violation of this rule.But on the other hand, if you still do everything your way, then why didn’t you create another account and live with it? I must admit that everyone here is not naive, and they perfectly understand what they do in such cases. You either follow the rules or don't give ultimatums.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: OP, do you still have access to the first email from your account? when viewing the log history of the account, the password change starts from the email and secret question. I assumed the account had switched users at least 1 time.but if you still have the original email from that account, you can send a message to the admin with that email. because usually admins won't miss a case like this for long if they already know about it and there are no other problems. send them another pm, wish you luck.
